coreAttributes.name: cuff choker necklace
coreAttributes.description: A solid band of metal with a gap at the back, allowing it to be fitted onto someone's neck.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] securely [npc.verb(slot)] the cuff choker necklace around [npc.her] neck.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] securely [npc.verb(slot)] the cuff choker necklace around [npc2.namePos] neck.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] firmly [npc.verb(grab)] [npc2.name], before forcing the cuff choker necklace around [npc2.her] neck.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] [npc.her] cuff choker necklace off from around [npc.her] neck.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] [npc2.namePos] cuff choker necklace off from around [npc2.her] neck.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] cuff choker necklace off from around [npc2.her] neck.
